item.title: Ghostly International - Ghostly 2 (free music download)
item.description:
I came to this music company (art gallery, design house, tech innovator, music pub and label) by way of an artist called 'Lusine' back in February 2013 when he released the outstanding album 'The Waiting Room'. On the music side of things they have a lot of output and mixes available. A lot of it can be found on Soundcloud.

On the 23rd December 2014 Ghostly Int. released this great set of 13 tracks for free. If you're a fan of ambient and techno and want to check out some new artists go download Ghostly 2 now and get listening you won't regret it. Oh and Happy New Year!

item.title: Zaria Forman now on Artsy
item.description:
Share article with Radio3

Tweet this article

A few months back I featured a piece of Zaria's work as a background for a post.

Following this I was contacted by Gabriel over at Artsy and was asked if I'd kindly link to Zaria Forman's page. Zaria is a fantastically talented artist and I'm a big fan of her work. Go visit her page now!

Gabriel - "Our newly designed page includes Forman's bio, over 70 of her works, and up-to-date listings of her exhibitions--it's a unique Zaria Forman resource. We also discuss Forman's work in an editorial covering artists drawing inspiration from water."
